publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-862 Patricia Ferguson: Yeah Butt No Butts in Maryhill—That the Parliament notes that 18% of girls and 12% of boys in Maryhill report that they regularly smoke cigarettes and welcomes the launch in Maryhill of "Yeah Butt No Butts", a specialist project dedicated to helping young people to stop smoking; further notes that this initiative comes at the request of young people themselves and will provide intensive support to them as they try to give up smoking, and wishes the project and the young people it works with every success.

S3M-862 Patricia Ferguson: Yeah Butt No Butts in Maryhill—That the Parliament notes that 18% of girls and 12% of boys in Maryhill report that they regularly smoke cigarettes and welcomes the launch in Maryhill of "Yeah Butt No Butts", a specialist project dedicated to helping young people to stop smoking; further notes that this initiative comes at the request of young people themselves and will provide intensive support to them as they try to give up smoking, and wishes the project and the young people it works with every success. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*, Elaine Murray*, Mary Mulligan*, George Foulkes*, Bill Butler*, Karen Gillon*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-862 Yeah Butt No Butts in Maryhill (lodged on 15 November 2007) James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-862 Yeah Butt No Butts in Maryhill (lodged on 15 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Trish Godman*
S3M-862 Yeah Butt No Butts in Maryhill (lodged on 15 November 2007) Irene Oldfather*
